briefTitle: Survey Study: Financial Impact of Breast Cancer Treatment
officialTitle: Determining the Financial Impact of Breast Cancer Treatment Over a One Year Period for Patients at a Rural Cancer Center
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in level of self-reported financial burden
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years or older
* Diagnosed with breast cancer or a recurrence of breast cancer within the past 2 years
* Willing to sign consent
* Able to read and complete surveys in English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Cancer diagnosis other than breast cancer
* More than 2 years since diagnosis with breast cancer or recurrence
